start

public void start()
DO NOT CALL YOURSELF. This will be called by the DroidGamingView, when the Surface comes up.

Overrides:
start in class java.lang.Thread

setSurfaceSize

public void setSurfaceSize(int width,
                           int height)
Called by DroidGamingView when the size of the Surface changes. DO NOT CALL YOURSELF!

Parameters:
width - Width of the surface.
height - Height of the surface.

setRunning

public void setRunning(boolean running)
Set the state of this thread to running. When you setRunning to false, the thread will exit, and it won't come back. So do only call when ending the game. If you want to pause the game use pause() and unPause().

Parameters:
running - The state of the thread.
See Also:
pause(), unPause()

unPause

public void unPause()
Unpauses the running of the gamethread. If you want real pause system you have to implement it in DroidGamingThread.GameListener.onFrameStart(eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread, eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread.GameEvent) and DroidGamingThread.GameListener.onFrameEnd(eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread, eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread.GameEvent). This is really pausing the thread, for example for when the Activity isn't visible anymore (default behavior).

See Also:
pause(), DroidGamingThread.GameListener.onFrameStart(eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread, eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread.GameEvent), DroidGamingThread.GameListener.onFrameEnd(eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread, eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread.GameEvent)

pause

public void pause()
Pauses the running of the gamethread. If you want real pause system you have to implement it in GameListener#onFrameStart(DroidGamingThread, GameEvent) and DroidGamingThread.GameListener.onFrameEnd(eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread, eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread.GameEvent). This is really pausing the thread, for example for when the Activity isn't visible anymore (default behaviour).

See Also:
unPause(), DroidGamingThread.GameListener.onFrameEnd(eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread, eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread.GameEvent), DroidGamingThread.GameListener.onFrameStart(eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread, eu.MrSnowflake.android.droidgaming.DroidGamingThread.GameEvent)
